Articles.Content: how do i get my main base upgraded please tell me
You need to post more detail, such as what "base" your talking about. Your post is to generic and doesn't have enough detail.

If you mean the Kerbal Space Center where all construction and launches are done, no upgrades are possible. The facility is what it is. There are some non-functional buildings, the functionality for those will presumably be added in future updates.
The research center is disabled if you're playing in sandbox mode- to enable it start a career game.
